ComicInfo.Summary: A chilling old-world vampire tale! As the rest of the team hunts for their missing man, a lone agent follows his mysterious benefactor further into the dark recesses of her world. Joshua Dysart (B.P.R.D.: 1946) and Hellboy creator Mike Mignola team up with sequential heartthrobs Gabriel Bá (The Umbrella Academy) and Fábio Moon (Sugarshock) for a new chapter in the hidden history of the B.P.R.D.! A direct sequel to the critically acclaimed B.P.R.D.: 1946! Art by Eisner Award-winning rising stars Fábio Moon and Gabriel Bá!
ComicInfo.Tags: Simon Anders,Bureau for Paranormal Research and Defense,Annaliese Brezina,Countess Ilona Kákosy,Jacob Stegner,Vampires,Katharina Brezina,Baron Konig
